name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitter(X) Dm extension && Cold outreach on Twitter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get higher response rates and make more sales from twitter(X) outreach

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝐕𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐨 𝐓𝐮𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐢𝐚𝐥𝐬 on how to use the features available on the extension homepage.

𝐓𝐨𝐩 7 𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐨𝐧𝐬 𝐬𝐚𝐥𝐞𝐬 𝐩𝐞𝐨𝐩𝐥𝐞 𝐠𝐞𝐭 𝐦𝐨𝐫𝐞 𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐩𝐨𝐧𝐬𝐞 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐦𝐚𝐤𝐞 𝐦𝐨𝐫𝐞 𝐬𝐚𝐥𝐞𝐬 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐓𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫(𝐗) 𝐃𝐦 𝐞𝐱𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧.

𝟏.  Mass message Twitter profiles with 𝗭𝗲𝗿𝗼 𝗿𝗶𝘀𝗸 of your account getting banned, and with perfectly personalized greeting lines that increases reply rates.

Our AI is smart enough to determine whether the username or profile name is suitable for a greeting (e.g., "Hi John") or to simply use "Hi."

𝟐. Add messaged Twitter profiles to a Google Sheet, enabling you to continue the messaging process on any device while ensuring that people who have already been messaged on a different device are not contacted again.

This is useful for teams to avoid repeatedly messaging the same individuals.


𝟑. Scrape leads for free from:

Twitter search results
An account's followers list
An account's following list
Replies under a tweet


𝟒. Save all your messaging scripts and quickly copy them while chatting with prospects with just a button click.

𝟓. Chat with prospects using Ai. 

𝟔. Get comprehensive information summary about each prospect who replies your message, based on their bio, tweets, and retweets, enabling you to adjust your messaging to each propsect personality. 

𝟕. You can process scraped leads' tweets or replies using AI to analyze them and determine if they match the tone or language of your ideal prospect.

Install this extension now to enjoy all these benefits!
